item.title: 江西铜业计划提高产量，预计价格将上涨
item.description: 中国最大的铜矿生产商江西铜业股份有限公司表示，预计一旦美联储降息，铜价将在下半年上涨，同时该公司承诺，尽管有人呼吁控制产量，但仍将保持两位数的产量增长。【原文：Jiangxi Copper Co., China’s largest producer, said it expects prices to rise in the second half once the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates, while pledging to maintain double-digit growth in output despite calls to rein in production.】

item.title: 新加坡在巴西贿赂案中起诉胜科海事前首席执行官
item.description: 胜科海事前首席执行官被指控贿赂巴西官员数百万美元，以促进新加坡公司在南美国家的利益。【原文：Sembcorp Marine’s former CEO was accused of bribing Brazilian officials millions of dollars to advance the Singapore company’s interests in the South American country.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Astignes 为新战略寻求数亿美元资金
item.description: Astignes Capital Asia Pte 从 4 月份开始向外部投资者开放新的 Astignes Systematic RV Macro Fund，寻求潜在的数亿美元资金。【原文：Astignes Capital Asia Pte is opening the new Astignes Systematic RV Macro Fund to outside investors starting in April, seeking potentially hundreds of millions of dollars, said people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行历史性一周：日本债券创 14 个月来最大流出量
item.description: 上周，由于日本央行 17 年来首次上调短期政策利率，日本债券遭遇了一年多来最严重的外国投资者抛售。【原文：Japanese bonds suffered the heaviest selling by foreign investors in more than a year last week, as the country’s central bank raised its short-term policy rate for the first time in 17 years.】

item.title: 日本市场面临复活节财政年度结束的风险
item.description: 随着日本财政年度接近尾声，全球许多市场正因复活节而关闭，日本货币、股票和债券面临的风险也在增加，而此时距离日本央行加息还不到两周时间。【原文：The risks are piling up for Japan’s currency, stocks and bonds as the nation’s fiscal year draws to an end right when many global markets close for Easter — and less then two weeks after the central bank hiked interest rates.】

item.title: 中国房地产危机波及最大银行
item.description: 中国房地产的长期低迷正在侵蚀中国最大国有银行的资产负债表，其不良贷款率也在不断攀升。【原文：China’s protracted property downturn is eroding the balance sheets of the nation’s largest state banks as their bad loan ratios are creeping up.】

item.title: 财报不佳，中国股市抹去三月涨幅
item.description: 中国股市抹去了 3 月份的涨幅，原因是财报令人失望，打压了市场情绪，加剧了人们对政策推动的涨势将进一步放缓的担忧。【原文：Chinese stocks erased their gains for March as earnings disappointments weighed down on sentiment, fueling concern that more of the policy-driven rally will unwind.】

item.title: 马克龙敦促巴西企业 "更加相信 "法国
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统正邀请巴西公司加强在法国的投资，以寻求国际合作伙伴关系的多样化。【原文：President Emmanuel Macron is inviting Brazilian companies to step up investment in France as he seeks to diversify international partnerships.】

item.title: 悉尼银行股有望创三年来最佳季度业绩
item.description: 澳大利亚银行股将创下自 2021 年以来的最大季度涨幅，但这一涨势可能会在未来几个月内经受考验，因为较低的官方利率会对利润前景造成压力。【原文：Australian bank shares are headed for their biggest quarterly gain since 2021, a rally that may be tested in coming months as lower official interest rates weigh on the outlook for margins.】

item.title: 中国债券热潮在最佳回报结束的担忧中消退
item.description: 中国政府债券连续五个月的强劲反弹似乎将在本月终结，因为避险买盘受到了第二季度债务发行量增加和人民币走软预期的威胁。【原文：A fizzing five-month rally in Chinese government bonds looks set to end this month, as the haven buying spree comes under threat from expectations of higher debt issuance in the second quarter and a weaker yuan.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，英国房屋销售商削减折扣
item.description: 由于对今年降息的预期不断升温，英国房屋销售商提供的折扣越来越小，从而刺激了需求。【原文：UK home sellers are offering smaller discounts as rising expectations of interest-rate cuts this year boost demand.】

item.title: 对冲成本上升，全球基金对亚洲新兴市场债券的投资降温
item.description: 由于对冲成本的上升侵蚀了收益，外国投资者对亚洲新兴债券的态度开始变得谨慎。【原文：Foreign investors are turning cautious on emerging Asian bonds as the rising cost of hedging eats into returns.】

item.title: 野村的 Willcox 称日元今年可能飙升至 1 美元兑 140 日元
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. expects the yen to strengthen against the dollar later this year, according to the firm’s head of trading and investment banking.】

item.title: 欧佩克+坚守减产底线，石油有望实现季度增长
item.description: 由于预期欧佩克+削减供应将收紧全球市场，石油价格攀升，有望实现季度稳健上涨。【原文：Oil climbed to head for a solid quarterly gain on expectations OPEC+ supply cuts would tighten the global market.】

item.title: 印度首次公开募股快速上涨 300% 后转为亏损
item.description: 索纳机械有限公司（Sona Machinery Ltd.）具备了首次公开募股（IPO）的所有条件，就像如今印度的大多数股票发行一样。这次销售超额认购了 273 倍，并引起了网络视频 "金融影响者 "的热议，他们都在吹捧新的交易。【原文：Sona Machinery Ltd. had all the trappings of a can’t-miss IPO, like most stock offerings in India these days. The sale was 273 times oversubscribed, and was creating buzz from online video “finfluencers” who tout new deals.】

item.title: 亚洲股市有望在美国股市逆风中高开：市场综述
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市早盘有望上涨，此前华尔街交易员在本季度的最后阶段推动股市走高，本季度股市大涨近 10%。【原文：Equity markets in Asia are poised for early gains Thursday after Wall Street traders sent stocks higher in the final stretch of a quarter that saw the market surge almost 10%.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好摩根大通提高动量交易警告。日本加大日元干预威胁。美国加大力度打击中国的芯片野心。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. JPMorgan raises momentum-trade warning. Japan amps up yen intervention threat. The US pushes harder against China’s chip ambitions. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔表示不急于降息
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，不必急于降息，并强调近期的经济数据证明今年的降息次数应该推迟或减少。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said there is no rush to lower interest rates, emphasizing that recent economic data warrants delaying or reducing the number of cuts seen this year.】

item.title: 被布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）抛弃的洛杉矶办公大楼面临取消赎回权的拍卖
item.description: 在业主布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）的一家附属公司离开大楼一年之后，洛杉矶市中心的一座办公大楼正面临取消赎回权的命运。【原文：An office tower in downtown Los Angeles is facing foreclosure a year after the owner, an affiliate of Brookfield Asset Management Ltd., walked away from the building.】

item.title: 墨西哥新国营航空公司因 8 亿美元合同纠纷遭起诉
item.description: 墨西哥新成立的国有航空公司被政府雇用来管理飞机租赁和雇用机组人员的公司告上法庭，称该航空公司缺乏合作，导致整个企业陷入困境。【原文：Mexico’s new state-owned airline was sued by the company that the government hired to manage plane leases and hire crews, claiming the carrier’s lack of cooperation has put the entire enterprise in jeopardy.】

item.title: 颠覆民主党的顶级民主党人乔-利伯曼逝世，享年 82 岁
item.description: 乔-利伯曼（Joe Lieberman）去世了，这位美国参议员和副总统提名人从可靠的自由主义者到顽固的中间派，在政治两极分化的时期放弃了民主党，赢得了人们的钦佩和蔑视。享年 82 岁。【原文：Joe Lieberman, the US senator and vice presidential nominee whose voyage from reliable liberal to stubborn centrist led him to abandon the Democratic Party at a time of political polarization, earning him both admiration and contempt, has died. He was 82.】

item.title: 瑞银银行家的挫败感暴露了气候融资领域的裂缝
item.description:
全球最大的银行正在悄悄地挽留碳密集型客户，因为在它们看来，监管机构和民间社会提出的要求并不现实，而且对它们的收费也构成了威胁。【原文：

The world’s biggest banks are quietly hanging on to carbon-intensive clients because of what they see as unrealistic demands from regulators and civil society — and the threat to their fees.

】

item.description:
山姆-班克曼-弗里德的刑事审判证据表明，FTX 从一开始就存在欺诈行为。【原文：

Evidence from the criminal trial of Sam Bankman-Fried suggests fraud was built into FTX from the very beginning.

item.title: 谈判破裂后，华盛顿特区的 NBA 和 NHL 球队不会迁至弗吉尼亚州
item.description: 由于弗吉尼亚州州长和东道主亚历山大市未能就项目条款达成一致，拟议中的耗资 20 亿美元的体育娱乐区计划已被搁置，华盛顿特区的两支职业运动队（篮球队华盛顿奇才队和曲棍球队华盛顿首都队）将迁至弗吉尼亚州。【原文：Plans for a proposed $2 billion sports and entertainment district that would have seen two professional DC sports teams — basketball’s Washington Wizards and hockey’s Washington Capitals — move to Virginia have been shelved after the state governor and the host city of Alexandria failed to agree on terms for the project.】

item.title: 马克龙政府计划进行具有政治风险的福利削减
item.description: 法国总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔（Gabriel Attal）承诺进一步削减失业福利，在欧洲大选前冒着引起反弹的风险，因为他正努力控制失控的预算赤字，并继续推进埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的经济改革议程。【原文：French Prime Minister Gabriel Attal pledged more cuts to unemployment welfare, risking a backlash ahead of European elections as he seeks to tame a runaway budget deficit and press on with President Emmanuel Macron’s economic-reform agenda.】

item.title: 富时暂不将韩国和印度纳入主要债券指数
item.description: 富时罗素（FTSE Russell）表示，韩国将继续留在其全球债券指数的观察名单上；印度将继续留在其新兴市场债券指数的观察名单上；这再次将这些国家加入关键指数的时间至少再推迟六个月。【原文：FTSE Russell said South Korea will continue to stay on the watch list for inclusion to its global bond index — and India for the emerging-market equivalent — once more delaying the countries’ addition to the key indexes by at least another six months.】

item.title: 跨山项目启动在即，加拿大石油流向洛杉矶
item.description: 加拿大运往洛杉矶的原油量激增，这可能预示着即将启动的扩建输油管道将如何重新分配太平洋沿岸的油流。【原文：Canadian crude shipments to Los Angeles are surging, a possible preview of how an expanded pipeline that’s nearing startup may redraw flows along the Pacific Coast.】

item.title: 地产公司 Adler 希望以高达 47% 的折扣出售资产
item.description: 阿德勒集团（Adler Group SA）要求其债券持有人允许其将一个未完工的公寓开发项目以比不到两年前的估值折价 47% 的价格出售，因为这家陷入困境的房东正在努力偿还其巨额债务。【原文：Adler Group SA asked its bondholders for permission to sell an unfinished apartment development at a 47% discount from where it was valued less than two years ago, as the embattled landlord races to repay its vast debt load.】

item.title: 施莱格尔称瑞士国家银行没有设定法郎汇率目标
item.description: 瑞士国家银行副行长马丁-施莱格尔（Martin Schlegel）表示，瑞士国家银行没有为法郎汇率设定目标，在此之前不到一周，瑞士国家银行的政策制定者们通过降低利率来阻止法郎的涨势，从而误导了市场。【原文：The Swiss National Bank has no target for the franc exchange rate, Vice President Martin Schlegel said less than a week after policymakers wrong-footed markets by cutting interest rates to stem the currency’s gains.】
